bulkPeriodicUpdate(address).details: consider dos vectors and changing return type

params.TCL: sum of all member commitment levels
params.k: steepness degree or pace of reputation changes

getLocalReputationScore(address,address).details: defaut value is 1 ether. Score should be parsed as ether with two decimals in expected range (0.01 - 9.99)

returns._0: array of integers: [difference in member nr. between periods | how many members last period | avg. reputation | avg. commitment ]

params.callerAgent_: address that called the function to be rewarded

interactionID(address,bytes).details: data_ is msg.data. encodeWithSignature for consistency

params.group_: target address to update group state for

params.points_: , amount of points to be awared for each of datas_, 0 to remove and readjust for performance

params.k: steepness degree for slope of local reputations score changes
params.p: min amount of time duration in seconds of period

params.group_: target group context for local repuatation update
params.who_: agent address to update local reputation for

bulkPeriodicUpdate(address).notice: updates the local reputation of all members in the given nova

calculateLocalReputation(uint256,uint256.notice: pure function for calculating local reputation

daoOfPlugin(address).notice: stores plugin(or authorised address)-dao relation on initialization

getGroupState(address).notice: gets the agregated last updated state of reputation related nova data

getIndividualState(address,address).notice: gets the last updated state of reputation for individual agent in a nova

getLRof(address,address).notice: get the individual state of a subject in a group

getLocalReputationScore(address,address).notice: get the local reputation score of an agent withoin a specified group.

getPeriodNovaParameters(address).notice: gets nova dynamic descriptive data updated at last period

interaction(bytes,address).notice: called only by plugin implementing interaction modifier to apply points for successfu execution

periodicGroupStateUpdate(address).notice: updates group state to latest to account for latest interactions

pointsPerInteraction(uint256).notice: stores amount of points awared per interaction

setInteractionWeights(address,bytes[],ui.notice: sets number of points each function in contexts asigns to caller

setKP(uint16,uint32,uint8,address).notice: sets k and p for specific group

updateIndividualLR(address,address).notice: updates local reputation of a specific individual context
